reviews.text: Had a great experience with tradional henna and lots of small interesting shops.
Good Place
Nice view, good food, normal prices but slow service
Nice food, amazing view, the beat turkish coffee and the shishas are so incredibly good!
Staff is nice, great view of a small gulf, food not so great, crowded on weekends.
Quite and good place for shishaa with perfect sea view .

Cozy
Good shisha
Tasty Egyptian food

Very interesting to explore the history of Bahrain as well as get insights into Bahrain's culture and traditions. Took a school group of almost 300 students. Had a great time. The staff and security are extremely helpful and the kids really had a wonderful time. Lost of interesting information and a large variety of things to see.

Very much impressed by the museum. The building itself is amazing, the way it is build is exceptional and the exhibits are really interesting. Someone can understand a lot about the country and the region. The museum is split in big rooms telling to the visitor a very interesting story.

Top notch museum. I was really impressed with the architecture, layout and thorough information presented with the exhibits. Saudi Jewelry exhibit was fascinating too. Only complaint would be the gift shop which was way too pricey and didn’t have a great selection.  But that’s minor. The grounds outside are also impressive and nice to wander around. Highly recommended

Absolute gem for anyone interested in the ancient history and culture of Bahrain. The place is jam packed with artefacts from the past, including a massively informative burial section with crypts and human remains from 4000 years ago. Bahrain has an extremely rich past and it is great to see the authorities preserving and displaying it in this manner. Lots to see and absorb so you can easily be immersed there for an entire day. Plan your trip accordingly!
One star off because many exhibits are not accompanied by any written information and that is a real pity because this is otherwise easily a top 5 star destination.

It was really amazing. Curator of the museum has done an excellent job. You can see all Bahrain and the region's history chronologically with the related historical artifacts.Also technological touches make  the museum more attractive. Also the building and surroundings also worth to see. Even our children (they are 5 and 10) had enjoyed the museum:)

UNESCO site. Having the findings of BC 1400.. Alexander the great visited and stayed here for some time. This place is well preserved. Visitors need to visit the Museum first to have better understanding. Get the guide machine from the museum.
Really nice fort. Good explanation. Nice coffee shop

A very well maintained fort but the only drawback is the headphones which explains about the historical significance of the place is not available (numbers are there but I don't know when I visited I came to know that they are not providing the headphones) nearby a beautiful beach is available for hangout!
Perhaps the most historical site to visit. Gives a true insight into the history of this wonderful island
Small but quite interesting. Worth reading the history on the board at the site, and worth going as the sun sets so you can see it in daylight and illuminated.

I attended an exhibition about CERN took place here. The exhibition was excellent, well organized and informative with much effort put into it. What made it nicer was the historical building that it took place in, that was a very well maintained and adjusted historical building to modern standards. This gives you a taste of the bahraini culture merged in modern era.
Went to see the CERN exhibition at Bin Matar House and it was fantastic. Definitely recommend it. The exhibition was brilliant and the setting of Bin Matar House was excellent.
Very neatly organized and informative tour . Visited the CERN exhibiton
This is next al hilal hospital
Lovely place. Calm and quiet.
Quiet Tea and sandwich specialist with lots of seating in the heart of the Suq in Manama. Great place for an evening meeting.
For sure you'll have different taste experience of tea from regular n I hope u'll like it
Very nice place interesting .. go when ur bored
Best tea in Bahrain and very good choice of sandwiches and finger food.
Tea n’ talk 😍 excellent
Want to try Filipino food? Then try visiting this Filipino restaurant. Good Food + Good service and welcoming staff.
A very nice place for authentic filipino cuisine with a very warm staff
Highly recommended for Filipino craving for a delicious lechon belly.
The best Filipino restaurant in Bahrain. Their food is really good and their staff are very nice as well.
Food n service was good. Fried food takes a lil while.

You could never have a boring night at Señor Paco's. Perfect for a night out, groups or otherwise. Perfect for birthdays and special occasions. If you're looking for a fun night out in general, Señor Paco's is the place to be. There is "live music" though it's quite clear that the singer is lip syncing and you could tell he never touches the guitar strings though it's not something that would ruin your night. The staff are attentive, helpful and professional.
First time there was more thsn 10 years ago and still same quality same great atmosphere. Great place for birthdays with lovely band and food and drinks
Awesome. Food amazing. Staff friendly. Prices are responsible. I just loved it, this is my first visit I will be there more sure.
The Mexican vibe brought to life, great music, good food and drinks plus guaranteed to use your dancing shoes 🎶🍹🍢
Food was extremely expensive. The frozen margarita was horrible sent it back for one on the rocks and they sent me the exact drink back. Not at all satisfied dont waste your money.
